text: @piersmorgan @Kwik_Fit other than greed there is no other reason why they should be open,my family member work there & is in the high risk asthma group but has to keep working, greeting customers who are scarily coming in for new tyres for the coronavirus?where they are going I don’t know 🤦🏻‍♀️
